description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-21371):

1. Download and apply the relevant updates from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (64-bit): [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a time-of-check time-of-use (TOCTOU) race condition issue within the Windows kernel.
- Ensure the appropriate build number is used for your Windows version: Windows 11 (build 22631, 22621) and Windows 10 (build 19045, 19044, 10240).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your system is running a supported version of Windows.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
